relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, mildly distended but nontender. Palpable inflammatory mass in LLQ. L flank incisional hernia soft, reducible, nontender. Well healed L flank and low transverse incisions.
relevant_findings.DRE: Normal tone, no gross or occult blood.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused. Palpable DP bilaterally.
